summary.para: Indicates how the pipeline interprets geometry or hull shader input primitives.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_UNDEFINED
member.summary: The shader has not been initialized with an input primitive type.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_POINT
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a point.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_LINE
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a line.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a triangle.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_LINE_ADJ
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a line with adjacency data.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLE_ADJ
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a triangle with adjacency data.

member.name: D3D11_PRIMITIVE.D3D11_PRIMITIVE_1_CONTROL_POINT_PATCH
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a control point patch.
